name: Doom clone (academic project)
description:
This is an academic project for my HND where I tried to recreate the original Doom shooter system with its weapons, included some from Doom 2.

The game features a twist having "moba" mechanics with two teams that has both a tower they must defend. Each tower will keep sending minions to the enemy in order to try and destroy their oponent's tower.

The game is in a prototype stage and the moba mechanics are not fully working, but the game has a fully pvp system in local coop, with one player using keyboard and mouse and the other with a gamepad.

Additional information
